title: Spearfishing
description: Spearfishing is a realistic underwater adventure where you explore lakes, seas, and oceans in search of marine life and hidden treasures. Armed with scuba gear and an upgradeable harpoon, youâ€™ll hunt over 30 species, from carp to sharks, while navigating coral reefs and avoiding deadly predators. Each dive brings new challenges, rewards, and breathtaking discoveries.
